text: The women's 4x100 metres relay event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 20 and 21 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Sherone Simpson Kerron Stewart Anneisha McLaughlin Simone Facey ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Lauryn Williams Ashlee Williams Shalonda Solomon Marshevet Hooker ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Jade Lucas-Read Jeanette Kwakye Amy Spencer Vernicha James ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 21 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
